attributes.comment:
My two concerns regarding the increase in fees are whether or not the increase is
going to actually reduce the amount of time it takes to process an I600A and the
fact that International adoptions take such a long time that many, if not the
majority, will have to pay these fees a second time because fingerprints are only
good for 15 months and 171Hs are only good for 18 months. I for one don't have a
problem paying the additional fees, but only if I can be guaranteed a much faster
turn-around time in receiving my 171H and only if I don't have to pay these fees a
second time because my adoption is taking longer than 15 or 18 months. If you're
going to increase the fees than at least provide families with more time to
complete their adoptions or at the very least provide a significant reduction in fees
if adoptions are taking longer than 15 month and 18 months.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Debra Weeks
